name: UIRectEdge
desc: Constants that specify the edges of a rectangle.

items.name: static var top: UIRectEdge
items.desc: The top edge of the rectangle.

items.name: static var left: UIRectEdge
items.desc: The left edge of the rectangle.

items.name: static var bottom: UIRectEdge
items.desc: The bottom edge of the rectangle.

items.name: static var right: UIRectEdge
items.desc: The right edge of the rectangle.
